content.query:
SELECT  
    [orderId]
    ,[sequence]
    ,[marketplaceOrderId]
    ,[sellerOrderId]
    ,[origin]
    ,[affiliateId]
    ,[salesChannel]
    ,[merchantName]
    ,[status]
    ,[statusDescription]
    ,[value]
    ,[creationDate]
    ,[orderGroup]
    ,(select [value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] where [id] = 'Items') as "Total_Items"
    ,(select [value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] where [id] = 'Discounts') as "Total_Discount"
    ,(select [value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] where [id] = 'Shipping') as "Total_Shipping"
    ,(select [value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] where [id] = 'Tax') as "Total_Tax"    
    into [cleasing_data].[vtex_order]
 FROM [raw_data].[vtex_order]
